entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY ENDED, Muskoka
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:06 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -3.7°C

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 06:06 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023
